dao

Interface ProductDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProductDB

    public interface ProductDAO
    This class provides the specification of the methods available to create, get and update Products and Prices. It is implemented in ProductDB.
    Author:
    oscar

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int FIRSTPRODUCTID
      First and last product id available that will be suggested by the system when creating a new product
      static int LASTPRODUCTID 
      static int MAXRESULTS
      Maximum results that the class can give in an array.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean create(int productId, float price, long date)
      Inserts the price in the database and returns true if it completes the operation.
      boolean create(int productId, Price price)
      Inserts the price in the database and returns true if it completes the operation.
      boolean create(int productId, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, float costPrice)
      Inserts the product in the database and returns true if it completes the operation.
      boolean create(Product product)
      Inserts the product in the database and returns true if it completes the operation.
      Product getProduct(int productId)
      Retrieves the Product with the specified productId from the database, null if not exists.
      Product[] getProducts(float minPrice, float maxPrice, boolean discontinued, java.lang.String filter)
      Retrieves the products (up to a max, if the array returned is max there may be results not listed) with the specified search criteria.
      int newProductId()
      Returns a high number (from 9000 to 9999) available to insert a new product.
      boolean update(int productId, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, float costPrice)
      Updates the product in the database and returns true if it completes the operation.
      boolean update(Product product)
      Updates the product in the database and returns true if it completes the operation.

    • Field Detail

      • MAXRESULTS

        static final int MAXRESULTS
        Maximum results that the class can give in an array. If an array returned by this class has more length than MAXRESULTS, there are results not given.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FIRSTPRODUCTID

        static final int FIRSTPRODUCTID
        First and last product id available that will be suggested by the system when creating a new product
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LASTPRODUCTID

        static final int LASTPRODUCTID
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getProduct

        Product getProduct(int productId)
        Retrieves the Product with the specified productId from the database, null if not exists.
        Parameters:
        productId - The unique ID of the product
        Returns:
        The product found in the database

      • getProducts

        Product[] getProducts(float minPrice,
                      float maxPrice,
                      boolean discontinued,
                      java.lang.String filter)
        Retrieves the products (up to a max, if the array returned is max there may be results not listed) with the specified search criteria. The filter search if every word introduced by the user is contained in any of the following: The product id, name or description.
        Parameters:
        minPrice - The minimum current price
        maxPrice - The maximum current price
        discontinued - If it is true, will show currently discontinued products
        filter - The words to find
        Returns:
        array of products

      • newProductId

        int newProductId()
        Returns a high number (from 9000 to 9999) available to insert a new product.
        Returns:
        A productId not used

      • create

        boolean create(Product product)
        Inserts the product in the database and returns true if it completes the operation.
        Parameters:
        product - The product to insert in the database
        Returns:
        True if it is inserted

      • create

        boolean create(int productId,
               java.lang.String name,
               java.lang.String description,
               float costPrice)
        Inserts the product in the database and returns true if it completes the operation.
        Parameters:
        productId - The unique ID of the product
        name - The name of the product
        description - A short description of the product
        costPrice - The cost price of the product
        Returns:
        True if it is inserted

        boolean update(Product product)
        Updates the product in the database and returns true if it completes the operation.
        Parameters:
        product - The product to update in the database
        Returns:
        True if it is updated

      • create

        boolean create(int productId,
               Price price)
        Inserts the price in the database and returns true if it completes the operation.
        Parameters:
        productId - The unique ID of the product
        price - A price with a date since it is valid
        Returns:
        True if it is inserted

      • create

        boolean create(int productId,
               float price,
               long date)
        Inserts the price in the database and returns true if it completes the operation.
        Parameters:
        productId - The unique ID of the product
        price - The price value
        date - The date since the price is valid
        Returns:
        True if it is inserted
